title: Restored Town House next to Penn, Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023.

title: Apt for rent-2 Bedrooms & Bonus room
description:
We are presently remodeling an apartment in a 100 year old Victorian home. Located a half a block from the north Wales train station .The building has three units. This unit is located on the second and third floor..
On the apartments main floor you have a living room, and a small kitchen which has new flooring, cabinets, built-in microwave, and small apartment sized refrigerator.
The apartment has all new flooring, and fresh paint.
There is driveway parking for one car, and your other car would have to park on the street… N. Wales Has Free parking permits for the use.
The apartment has two bedrooms, plus a bonus room. We call it  a bonus room because it has heat etc., but no closet. The last tenant who lived here over 10 years, used this room as a bedroom for their child.
This is a no smoking, no pet unit.
The reason we are not posting pictures now, we are still in process of renovation and this apartment should be ready to go by August 15th.
Rent is 1400 per month, plus electric. We will provide gas heat,  water & sewer, and trash removal.
Sorry, we are presently not accepting section 8 housing vouchers.

title: Enter into a foyer with excellent storage space
description:
Light-filled two bedroom, two bathroom showcasing serene river and city views at Pier 3 Condominiums! Enter into a foyer with excellent storage space that leads to the main floor of the residence. This contemporary home features tall ceilings with exposed beams and tile flooring throughout all living areas. The generously combined living/dining room has an ornamental fireplace and oversized windows showcasing beautiful Delaware River vistas. Adjacent, the kitchen has great cabinetry space, black appliances and upgraded countertops and backsplash. Both bedrooms have ample closet space and oversized windows; the spacious master suite features an outdoor balcony overlooking the building's atrium and an updated ensuite bathroom. The second bedroom enjoys use of a nearby full hall bath with a stall shower and stackable washer/dryer. Highlights include updated ceiling fans, light fixtures and baseboard moldings throughout. Residents of Pier 3 enjoy a twenty-four hour doorman, heated indoor pool, fitness center, and one unassigned garage parking space.

title: this sweet 2 Bed/2 Bath townhouse
description:
Quintessentially Queen Village, this sweet 2 Bed/2 Bath townhouse is located in the heart of the Meredith catchment and yet set back from the street for the utmost in quiet and seclusion. The handsome stone and steel kitchen looks over the chic living room, with a fireplace, exposed brick, hardwood floors, and a built-in desk and shelves. The second-floor bedroom is flanked by large windows and sliders with a Juliet balcony, a newly tiled three-piece bath, and convenient full-size laundry. The third-floor primary suite is sun-drenched, with a large full bath and ample closet space, and access to the deck and rooftop. A top-notch offering in a bar-none location.

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment, Wood Floors, Lounge, Near Stores
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! The kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!

title: MOVE-IN SPECIAL! Luxury3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available Aug
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants. Ask us about our Move-In special for August 2022!

title: well-maintained twin home in Lexington Park, Northeast Philadelphia!
description:
Reach me here  show contact info
Welcome to this well-maintained twin home in the scenic Lexington Park section of Northeast Philadelphia!  What an opportunity to own a home that has been within the same family for the last 49 years! Lexington Park provides that great mix of a suburban setting in the urban environment. This home includes 3 bedrooms, 1 full & 1 half bathrooms, with a finished basement having direct access to the outside. The home being on a spacious corner lot, is just steps away from Pennypack Park. As you enter this home into the large & bright living room, natural light fills the space from the front windows. The living room shares its large space with the dining room and flows to the kitchen. The kitchen just recently had new flooring installed to compliment the existing cabinets. Leaving the dining room space heading down the hallway, you will find the refreshed bathroom with new flooring. The 3 bedrooms all share this same level for a convenient single floor living format.  The home’s recently exposed original Hardwood Flooring has been preserved under carpets over the years. These clean floors are now just awaiting your finishing touch to amplify their beauty.  The true bonus of this home comes from the finished basement space that has its own direct access to the main side entrance of the property.  The half bathroom is in this space for added convenience within this lower level. The finished basement area doubles the shared living space adding so much value to the layout of the home. This bonus space provides the opportunity for the work from home individual or a home based business (where applicable under current zoning laws).  The exterior of the property benefits from a rear shared alleyway for access to your own private driveway.  The corner lot also provides ample street parking along the side of the home. The 1-car garage with automatic opener was partially finished to bonus room space shared with the finished basement. This is the home that you have been waiting for to put your own personal touch.  Let’s make this one your family’s home for the next 50 years too!  This well cared for home can use some modern updates, but the price reflects accordingly to amenities and the tremendous location.    The Pennypack Park Trails are within a 5-minute walk of the house, providing access to one of the larger park spaces in Philadelphia.  Several SEPTA bus routes are within blocks of the home, including the Routes 14, the Boulevard Direct, 20, 28, and 50.  Additionally, Nazareth Hospital is less than 0.5 mile from the home too.
